item.title: 捷克通胀率下降，决策者讨论放缓宽松步伐
item.description: 捷克 5 月份通胀率降幅超过预期，但仍高于央行的预期，决策者正在讨论是否在本月放缓货币宽松政策的步伐。【原文：Czech inflation dropped more than expected in May but remained above the central bank’s forecast as policymakers are debating whether to slow the pace of monetary easing this month.】

item.title: 欧洲股市重拾升势，美国加息将焦点从法国移开
item.description: 欧洲议会选举的结果和法国政治不确定性的加剧使人们将注意力从美国的利率走势转向欧洲股市，欧洲股市随之上扬，收复了失地。【原文：European stocks rose, recovering ground as attention turned from the results of the European Parliament election and heightened political uncertainty in France to the path of interest rates in the US.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织与肯尼亚就获取 11 亿美元达成初步协议
item.description: 国际货币基金组织与肯尼亚达成初步协议，帮助这个东非国家获得约 11 亿美元的资金。【原文：The International Monetary Fund and Kenya reached a preliminary agreement to help unlock about $1.1 billion of funding for the East African nation.】

item.title: 金鹅确定 5.58 亿欧元米兰首次公开募股的价格范围
item.description: 金鹅集团（Golden Goose Group SpA）及其股东正寻求在该奢侈运动鞋品牌的首次公开募股中筹集约 5.58 亿欧元（约合 6 亿美元）的资金，从而进一步推动欧洲的上市复苏。【原文：Golden Goose Group SpA and its shareholders are seeking to raise about €558 million ($600 million) in the luxury sneaker brand’s initial public offering, in a further boost to Europe’s listings resurgence.】

item.title: 沙特公用事业公司计划出售 19 亿美元股票为扩建提供资金
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的 Acwa 电力公司正计划通过向现有股东发行股票筹集 71 亿里亚尔（19 亿美元）的资金，利用自 2021 年上市以来股价上涨超过六倍的机会。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Acwa Power Co. is planning to raise 7.1 billion riyals ($1.9 billion) by issuing stock to existing shareholders, capitalizing on a more than sixfold increase in its share price since a 2021 listing.】

item.title: 比特币面临 "至关重要 "的 36 小时，对美国收益率的敏感度升高
item.description: 在美联储利率决定和美国关键通胀数据公布之前，全球市场人心惶惶。比特币投资者有理由对潜在的波动保持特别警惕。【原文：Global markets are on tenterhooks ahead of a Federal Reserve interest-rate decision and key US inflation figures. Bitcoin investors have reason to be particularly alert for potential volatility.】

item.title: 中国七年来首次派总理访问澳大利亚
item.description: 李强总理将于本周六抵达澳大利亚，成为七年来访问澳大利亚的最高级别中国领导人，这一外交里程碑可能会因投资和军事部署方面的新摩擦而蒙上阴影。【原文：Premier Li Qiang will be the most senior Chinese leader to visit Australia in seven years when he touches down on Saturday, a diplomatic milestone that may be overshadowed by renewed frictions over investment and military deployments.】

item.title: 曼谷著名的查图查市场发生火灾，数百只笼养动物丧生
item.description: 曼谷（美联社）— 周二，泰国首都最著名的市场之一 Chatuchak Weekend Market 发生火灾，数百只笼养动物死亡。【原文：BANGKOK (AP) — Hundreds of caged animals died Tuesday after a fire struck Chatuchak Weekend Market, one of the most famous markets in Thailand’s capital.】

item.title: Segantii 内幕交易案的关键在于影响市场的大宗交易
item.description: 在香港进行致命股票交易七年后，Segantii 资本管理有限公司及其创始人西蒙-赛德勒（Simon Sadler）将于周三重返法庭，面对内幕交易指控。【原文：Seven years after a fateful stock trade in Hong Kong, Segantii Capital Management Ltd. and its founder Simon Sadler will return to court on Wednesday to face insider dealing charges.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国失业率升至 2021 年以来最高点
item.description: 通勤者穿过伦敦塔桥。摄影师：Jason Alden/Bloomberg【原文：Commuters cross Tower Bridge in London. Photographer: Jason Alden/Bloomberg】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 大众和五十铃为南非的电动汽车雄心泼冷水
item.description: 大众汽车公司和五十铃汽车有限公司对南非发展电动汽车和氢动力汽车产业的计划表示怀疑。【原文：Volkswagen AG and Isuzu Motors Ltd. have expressed skepticism about South Africa’s plans to develop electric and hydrogen-powered vehicle industries.】

item.title: 乌克兰希望更多天然气贸易商在 9 月前使用其储气库
item.description: 乌克兰最大的能源公司负责人表示，尽管俄罗斯不断发动袭击，但乌克兰预计到 9 月份会有更多欧洲公司使用其天然气储存设施。【原文：Ukraine expects more European companies to use its gas storage by September despite ongoing Russian attacks, according to the head of the nation’s biggest energy company.】

item.title: 战争余震迫使以色列人面对延迟的通胀高峰
item.description: 以色列的奥法基姆镇与加沙仅咫尺之遥，战争已在那里持续了八个月。但直到现在，冲突造成的通货膨胀影响才深入人心。【原文：The Israeli town of Ofakim is just a short distance from Gaza, where war has raged for eight months. But it’s taken until now for the inflationary fallout of the conflict to hit home.】

item.title: 后裔，跟着点走
item.description:
当美联储仍在规划从高利率下行的路线时，其他央行也开始了自己的行动。【原文：

While the Fed still plots its course down from high rates, other central banks are starting off on their own. 

】

item.title: 菲律宾费率制定者预计 2024 年将多次下调费率以刺激增长
item.description: 菲律宾货币委员会成员本杰明-迪奥克诺（Benjamin Diokno）表示，菲律宾央行今年至少有两次下调关键利率的空间，以刺激经济增长，理由是通胀率在目标范围内，比索 "强劲"。【原文：The Philippine central bank has space to cut its key interest rate at least twice this year to spur economic growth, Monetary Board Member Benjamin Diokno said, citing within-target inflation and a “robust” peso.】

item.title: 西门子能源着眼于最大风力涡轮机，与中国一较高下
item.description: 西门子能源股份公司（Siemens Energy AG）已告知客户，该公司计划生产最大的风力涡轮机，并有可能在本世纪末投产，以保持其在增长最快的能源领域之一的领先地位。【原文：Siemens Energy AG has told customers it plans to produce its biggest wind turbine, potentially toward the end of the decade, as the company seeks to maintain its lead in one of the fastest-growing energy sectors.】

item.title: 消息称现代汽车计划于 6 月在印度上市
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，现代汽车公司正计划最快于本月为其印度分公司申请首次公开募股，并有可能在今年年底前上市。【原文：Hyundai Motor Co. is planning to file for an initial public offering for its India unit as soon as this month, according to people familiar with the matter, with a potential listing planned by the end of the year.】

item.title: 中国呼吁 "开放心态 "激发新住房措施的希望
item.description: 中国敦促官员对减少住房库存的政策保持 "开放的心态"，这一信号导致华尔街经济学家预测中国政府将采取新的措施并增加资金，以支撑市场。【原文：China urged officials to keep an “open mind” over policies to reduce housing inventory, a signal that led Wall Street economists to predict new measures and additional funding in Beijing’s bid to shore up the market.】

item.title: 经济忧虑破坏投资者情绪，中国股市大幅下挫
item.description: 交易员结束长周末返程后，中国股市下跌，一系列不利的事态发展打压了市场情绪。【原文：Chinese stocks dropped after traders returned from a long weekend as a slew of negative developments weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 印尼盾创四年新低，佐科威发出悲观声音
item.description: 印尼总统佐科-维多多（Joko Widodo）回避了人们对印尼盾近期疲软的担忧，这表明央行下周加息的政治压力可能不大。【原文：Indonesian President Joko Widodo has shrugged off concerns about the rupiah’s recent bout of weakness, signaling there may be little political pressure for the central bank to raise interest rates next week.】

item.title: 花旗集团任命市场资深人士罗伯特-中村（Robert Nakamura）为日本业务主管
item.description: 花旗集团任命罗伯特-中村（Robert Nakamura）为新任日本国家官员，在交易蓬勃发展之际，让这位市场资深人士负责当地业务。【原文：Citigroup Inc. appointed Robert Nakamura as its new Japan country officer, putting the markets veteran in charge of local operations as trading booms.】

item.title: 分析师欢迎莫迪信任西塔拉曼出任财政部长
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）决定重新任命尼尔马拉-西塔拉曼（Nirmala Sitharaman）为印度财政部长，这被市场分析人士视为政策连续性的一个强烈信号。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s decision to reappoint Nirmala Sitharaman as the country’s finance minister is being seen by market analysts as a strong signal of policy continuity.】

item.title: 印度市场热点：农场股票大放异彩，现金墙对基金造成冲击
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您提供可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件的每日摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a daily digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 比特币跌至一周低点，交易商等待 CPI 和美联储决议
item.description: 在美国通胀数据和美联储货币政策决定公布之前，比特币周二出现波动，显示出交易者的紧张情绪。【原文：Bitcoin wobbled on Tuesday in a sign of trader nerves ahead of US inflation data and the Federal Reserve’s monetary-policy decision.】

item.title: 中国建筑商德信收到香港法院的清盘令
item.description: 一家中国中型开发商在香港的清盘案中败诉，面临法院下令清盘的命运，这使得涉及逾期债务的债权人在法律上获胜的案例越来越多。【原文：A medium-sized Chinese developer faces court-ordered liquidation after losing a winding-up case in Hong Kong, adding to a growing number of legal victories for creditors involving overdue debt.】

item.title: Janus Henderson 押注依然低廉的日本金融股
item.description: Janus Henderson Investors 投资组合经理表示，尽管日本金融公司在过去一年中稳步上涨，但其价值仍被低估，股息支付的增加使其成为一项良好的投资。【原文：Japanese financial firms still look undervalued despite their steady gains in the past year, with rising dividend payments making them a good investment, according to a Janus Henderson Investors portfolio manager.】

item.title: 丰田的错误认证也违反了联合国规则：读卖新闻
item.description: 读卖新闻》（Yomiuri）周二报道称，日本政府发现丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp.【原文：The Japanese government has found that regulatory discrepancies in a number of Toyota Motor Corp. cars also breach United Nations standards adopted by 62 countries and regions, the Yomiuri reported Tuesday without attribution.】

item.title: 新加坡加强对家族办公室和对冲基金的审查
item.description: 新加坡当局要求家族办公室和对冲基金提供更多信息，同时在一连串丑闻凸显出这个金融中心的监管漏洞之后，加紧关闭处于休眠状态的公司。【原文：Singapore authorities are demanding more information from family offices and hedge funds while stepping up closures of dormant firms after a string of scandals highlighted cracks in the financial hub’s oversight.】

item.title: 大和证券将从激进基金手中收购青空银行股份
item.description: 大和证券集团（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc. said it has agreed to buy a stake in Aozora Bank Ltd. from a fund with ties to Japan’s most prominent activist.】
